alert.note: Alert for Cobb; DeKalb; North Fulton (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 04 at 9:14PM EDT by NWS Atlanta
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of northwestern DeKalb, east central Cobb and central Fulton Counties through 945 PM EDT... At 913 PM EDT, a line of strong thunderstorms extended from Sandy Springs to Atlantic Station to Lakewood Park, and moving west at up to 10 mph. HAZARD...40 to 50 mph wind, frequent cloud to ground lightning and heavy rain. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect minor damage to tree limbs and blowing around of light, unsecured objects. Heavy rain may cause temporary street flooding especially in poor drainage areas. Locations impacted include... Atlanta, Decatur, Sandy Springs, Dunwoody, East Point, Chamblee, North Atlanta, North Druid Hills, Midtown, Grant Park-Zoo Atlanta, Druid Hills, Candler-Mcafee, Sweet Auburn, Piedmont Park, Lakewood Park, Brookhaven, East Lake, Little Five Points, Atlantic Station and Chastain Memorial Park. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: People outdoors should seek shelter immediately. If you can hear thunder, you are close enough to be struck by lightning. Motorists should slow down and be prepared for possible loss of control due to hydroplaning.
